pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gaim (2013, TV show)$(br2)Used to craft Zangetsu Shin's $(l:gaim/devices/genesis_driver_zangetsu_shin)Genesis Driver (Zangetsu Shin)$(/l)$(br2)Used to access $(l:gaim/riders/zangetsu_shin#melon_energy)Melon Energy Arms$(/l) or $(l:gaim/riders/gaim#jimber_melon)Jimber Melon Arms$(/l)
